price: (6) As mercy from your Lord. Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Knowing,
arabic: رَحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: raḥmatan min rabbika innahu huwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
